remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需 XSD 資料類型的詳細資訊，請參閱 < XML 資料類型參考 > 在 MSDN Library 中http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about XSD data types, see "XML Data Types Reference" in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別來包裝 XSD`time`型別。The following code example demonstrates using the class to wrap an XSD `time` type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是能夠剖析 HH:mm:ss.fffzzz 格式的字串。The method is capable of parsing strings in the HH:mm:ss.fffzzz format. 這是由下列的格式模式所組成。This is composed out of the following format patterns. |格式模式Format Pattern|描述Description|範例Examples| |--------------------|-----------------|--------------| |HHHH|24 小時範圍內的小時。The hour within a 24-hour range. 一位數的小時有前置零。Single-digit hours have a leading zero.|17, 0717, 07| |mmmm|分鐘。The minute. 一位數的分鐘有前置零。Single-digit minutes have a leading zero.|49, 0549, 05| |ssss|第二個。The second. 一位數的秒有前置零。Single-digit seconds have a leading zero.|32, 0232, 02| |ffffff|秒數部分。The fraction of a second. 允許最大值為 7 的小數位數，以及剖析的前三個。A maximum of 7 fraction digits are allowed, and only the first three are parsed.|321635, 4592321635, 4592| |zzzzzz|完整時區位移 （小時和分鐘） 從 Universal Time Coordinate （格林威治標準時間）。The full time zone offset (hour and minutes) from the Universal Time Coordinate (Greenwich Mean Time). 一位數的小時有前置零。Single-digit hours have a leading zero.|-07:00, +08:00, Z-07:00, +08:00, Z| 因為已剖析的值儲存為剖析的第一個 3 分數位數物件，而型別支援精確 3 的小數位數的精確度。Only the first 3 fraction digits are parsed because the parsed value is stored as a object, and the type supports precisely 3 fraction digits of accuracy. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示如何使用這個方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 這個程式碼範例是所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapTime#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapTime/CPP/demo.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapTime#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapTime/CS/demo.cs#11)]
